description:
Do you use Social Media in your marketing? do you want to build a massive following on social media and go viral for free? want other people to share and like your business and tell other people about you and what you do? then you NEED a viral contest.

In this course you will learn how to create contests that go viral in minutes and that will help you get Facebook likes,YouTube Subscribers and views,Twitter and pinterest followers AND bring your offers laser targeted traffic too!

how? by creating a contest with our SociContest app (which you get a free lifetime membership in when you join this course) you will be able to create contests in minutes and have people sending you traffic that converts like crazy!

sounds too good to be true? join the course and watch me build a live campaign and see the results yourself!

Udemy and I offer you a 30 day money back guarantee that makes this course a no brainer!

so what are you waiting for? join the course now and I will see you on the other side.
title: Facebook Marketing 2016: #5 Viral Facebook Contests
